fields.name: Category
fields.description: Name of a Diagnostic Metric category for a resource type this setting is applied to. To obtain the list of Diagnostic metric categories for a resource, first perform a GET diagnostic settings operation.

fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: a value indicating whether this category is enabled.

fields.name: RetentionPolicy
fields.description: the retention policy for this category.

fields.name: TimeGrain
fields.description: the timegrain of the metric in ISO8601 format.
